articles.title: How the Miami GP has prepared for Florida's natural hazards - Autosport
articles.description: Miami International Autodrome, the home of Formula 1’s new Grand Prix on the American East Coast, has taken precautions against the natural hazards that South Florida can provide.
articles.content:
Due to its location at Hard Rock Stadium in Miami Gardens, F1's newest racetrack designed and overseen by UK firm Apex Circuit Design has had to fit in with its environment.
